sum_refunded_pay_fee_account_amt = #{sumRefundedPayFeeAccountAmt,jdbcType=BIGINT},
sum_refunded_receive_fee_account_amt = #{sumRefundedReceiveFeeAccountAmt,jdbcType=BIGINT},
sum_refunded_pay_account_out_accounting_amt = #{sumRefundedPayAccountOutAccountingAmt,jdbcType=BIGINT},
sum_refunded_pay_ledger_amt = #{sumRefundedPayLedgerAmt,jdbcType=BIGINT},
sum_supplied_amt = #{sumSuppliedAmt,jdbcType=BIGINT},
sum_refunded_supply_refund_amt = #{sumRefundedSupplyRefundAmt,jdbcType=BIGINT},
sum_distributed_royalty_amt = #{sumDistributedRoyaltyAmt,jdbcType=BIGINT},
sum_refunded_distributed_royalty_amt = #{sumRefundedDistributedRoyaltyAmt,jdbcType=BIGINT},
continue_trade_status = #{continueTradeStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
trade_extend_field_1 = #{tradeExtendField1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trade_extend_field_2 = #{tradeExtendField2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trade_extend_field_3 = #{tradeExtendField3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trade_extend_field_4 = #{tradeExtendField4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trade_extend_field_5 = #{tradeExtendField5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trade_extend_field_6 = #{tradeExtendField6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trade_extend_field_7 = #{tradeExtendField7,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trade_extend_field_8 = #{tradeExtendField8,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trade_extend_field_9 = #{tradeExtendField9,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trade_extend_field_10 = #{tradeExtendField10,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
extend_profit_loss = #{extendProfitLoss,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
version = version+1,
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}
